The given paragraph mentions the "ATM (A - T mutated) gene" as the disease entity. It is important to note that "ATM gene" itself is not a disease, but rather a gene that, when mutated, can lead to various diseases such as Ataxia-Telangiectasia or other related conditions. Therefore, the precise entity mentioned in the paragraph is "ATM (A - T mutated) gene".
